title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, November 6, 2014
teaser: On today's show we are live with Quartz from The Next Billion event in New York City. First up, Rashad Robinson, Executive Director of ColorOfChange, the nation's largest online civil rights organization. Then, host Ben Johnson is center stage with Jonathan Cedar, CEO of Biolite, to talk about the tech solutions to the health problems associated with cooking over an open-fire in the developing world.
